description: Yoga master Graham showed Chase the basics of yoga, and it was hot as hell! The poses that these two hunks were in left us wanting more…and boy, did they ever give more! Asses in the air, hot bodies being stretched, and a good post-workout fuck! “Gotta limber up before our next workout.” Graham was all smiles watching Chase do those sexy yoga poses. “You gotta be flexible for sex to have it be really fun!” This relaxing experience made both teacher and student very horny, and it was Chase's turn to show Graham a more intense workout!
title: Chase & Graham: Bareback
